summary: Implements HTTP request handler classes that parse incoming traffic, resolve the appropriate Moto backend from the request host, and either serve mocked AWS responses or forward the request through a proxy. Supports CONNECT tunneling, GET forwarding, chunked transfer encoding, SSL handling, and request body decoding.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS services locally by providing a mock server that emulates AWS endpoints and optionally proxies traffic to real services.
